text.text:
🚀 Big News for Hackspiration'24 Participants: Rise In Joins 🌐

The Hackspiration'24 community just got even bigger and better! We're thrilled to announce Rise In as a sponsor. Rise In is a leading talent ecosystem builder in Web3. They have helped 50k+ talents, mostly developers, all around the world learn about blockchain technology and build their careers in the industry by providing free courses, boot camps, and career support.

🏆 Exclusive Rewards: Compete for $50 worth of prizes and a special Rise In Stellar certificate for outstanding projects.
💻 Hands-on Coding: Apply your learnings with a final project, at Hackspiration'24.
🔍 Deep Dive into Soroban & Stellar: Gain in-depth knowledge of these key Web3 technologies.
🚪 Future Opportunities: Qualify for the Rise In Web3 Membership program, designed to support your Web3 career path.

Don't miss out on this transformative journey!
Make sure to RSVP to confirm your participation! (https://lnkd.in/dkuF3zFV)

#Hackspiration24 #Web3 #RiseIn #Soroban #Stellar #Bootcamp #India #Blockchain #Technology #Innovation

text.text:
🚀 Exciting News! 🚀
I had an amazing time at the recent  Docker & CNCG Pune meetup hosted at Nutanix Pune! It was an enriching experience filled with insightful talks, and networking opportunities! 🎉
Big shoutout to the organizers for putting together such a fantastic event! The lineup of expert talks covered a wide range of topics including DevSecOps, Docker's new features, AI/ML in Kubernetes, GenAI, Observability, and more. 💡
I was particularly inspired by the sessions on CNCF Open Source Project Contribution by Richie S. , deploying applications smoothly on GCP using CI/CD pipeline & Docker by Narsing Sabne , and monitoring a Linux host with Prometheus, Node Exporter, and Docker Compose by Chaitali Totala . Each talk offered valuable insights and practical knowledge that I can't wait to implement in my own projects. 🛠️
The venue was buzzing with enthusiastic professionals, and I had the opportunity to connect with some brilliant minds in the industry.
If you're passionate about Docker, Kubernetes, and all things cloud-native, I highly recommend joining the Docker & CNCG Pune meetup community. Don't miss out on the next one!
A huge thank you to everyone who made this event possible. Looking forward to more such learning and fun-filled meetups in the future! 😊

#Docker #CNCG #Meetup #Pune #Nutanix #DevOps #Kubernetes #Networking #LearningAndFun #Grateful

text.text: Excited to Share My Experience at the Global AI Bootcamp 2024 in Pune!  Had an absolutely enriching day diving deep into the world of Artificial Intelligence at the Global AI Bootcamp 2024 organized by Pune User Group in association with Synergetics Learning. From understanding the fundamentals of AI to exploring advanced concepts like Generative AI and Large Language Models, every session was a treasure trove of knowledge. 💡 The sessions led by Sonu Sathyadas (MCT, MCSA, MCSE) and Yogesh Haribhau Kulkarni were incredibly insightful. Sonu's breakdown of AI types, ML, DL, and Generative AI left me in awe of the possibilities. Yogesh's exploration of using Large Language Models for geometric algorithms opened my eyes to the endless applications of AI beyond traditional domains. 🎓 The best part? Walking away with a certification badge from Synergetics India, a testament to the valuable learning gained from this event. A big shoutout to Pune User Group and Synergetics for organizing such an impactful bootcamp and providing a platform for AI enthusiasts like myself to connect and learn together. Can't wait to implement all the newfound knowledge into my AI projects! #GlobalAIBootcamp #AI #ArtificialIntelligence #LearningJourney #SynergeticsIndia #PuneUserGroup #CertificationBadge #Networking #ExcitedLearner ✨

miniCompany.name: APGI - Agile Practitioners Group of India

text.text:
THANK YOU, Team ! 
This shoutout is for you all , who were a part of the actual day volunteering team at Regional Scrum Gathering 2024, Pune. I wish to take a moment to extend my heartfelt appreciation to each one of you who dedicated your time, skills, and passion to make this conference a resounding success. Your hard work behind the scenes did not go unnoticed, and your positive energy brought a special spark to every aspect of the conference.
From greeting attendees with warm smiles to ensuring every session ran smoothly, your contributions were invaluable in creating a memorable experience for everyone involved.
It's through your dedication and commitment that we were able to bring together industry experts, innovators, and enthusiasts to share knowledge, forge connections, and inspire each other to new heights.
I am sure this journey of around 8 months has been really enriching for all of us. Every contribution of yours is highly appreciated! 

Vijay Wade , Manjunath MS Rao , Sriharsha B, ICF-ACC, E-BAC, CAL® - Your guidance and support at every step is highly appreciated. You were our support pillars , whenever we were struck somewhere, you showed us the path, empowered us!! Thanks for everything.

Mayuresh T Athalekar Thanks a lot for managing the entire program in such a positive manner. And Kudos for taking up procurement responsibility , when conference was just a month later. You rocked!

Navneet Chandra, Sudhanshu Rawlani Hats off to your energy and patience for handling hotel and AV guys. There was a lot of co- ordination involved and u both streamlined it so well!

Amol Purohit ,Rahul Ainchwar , Dharnendra (Dhiren) Shah, Deepti Pathak Paradkar, Nitin Mittal , Suvarna Kulkarni , Ketan Kulkarni for handling the reviews of proposals with utmost integrity and yielding the conference with insightful sessions. 

Sushil S. , Tejas Tamhane , Pallavi Lohia , Anand Datir, SAFe®6 SPC ICP-ACC PMP® CSM® PRINCE®, Hrishikesh Bhruguwar - Kudos to your patience in branding the entire conference on social media! 

Prasad Thorgule, Rakshanda Giri , Swarup Vishwas - I fall short of words to thank you for updating our website day in and day out. 

Vaibhav Sharma , Rahul Sharma - Thanks for all the procurement of goodies. I know, there were certain challenges in terms of last minute requests, still you guys could get the goodies on time!

Pranita Kutariya-Kahale, Rahul Shah, Ankur Ranka, Leela VenkataSatish Kolla Venkatasubramanian , Ramanathan Yegyanarayanan - Your presence and involvement on the actual day is truly heart warming. Heartfelt gratitude for your support and efforts , as always ! You guys rocked the show!

Ketan Kulkarni I fall short of words to appreciate your creativity towards Agile Sphere 😊 The way you were committed towards agile Sphere is fantastic!!

Uday Uttarwar - You were deeply missed by all of us!

APGI - Agile Practitioners Group of India #RSGPUNE2024

description.text: Want to build cool blockchain stuff but are overwhelmed by complex tools? Verbwire is here to help! Verbwire simplifies smart contract deployment. Dep

text.text:
Exciting news! Verbwire is now an official sponsor of Hackspiration'24, and we're thrilled to have you join us for this incredible hackathon. Checkout this article and blog (https://lnkd.in/dJyDjzU9) to know more about what they offer.

Join over 750 innovators this April at Vishwakarma Institute of Technology's Microsoft Learn Student Club for a transformative experience.

Hackspiration'24 isn't just about Web3; it's a blend of GenAI, Cloud, IoT, and more, offering challenges that cater to all domains. As a participant, you'll receive a one-month free Verbwire Starter Subscription and $150 USD in credits from Solidity Scan for Web3 projects.

With a prize pool worth over 6 lakh INR (8k USD) and top teams securing a free .xyz domain for a year, this hackathon is your gateway to innovation. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned pro, Hackspiration'24 welcomes all skill levels. Don't miss this opportunity to network, learn, and turn your ideas into reality.
Register now and join us on April 15th for a week of hacking, learning, and fun! LINK: https://lnkd.in/dkuF3zFV

text.text:
Just attended the AWS User Group Pune March Meet-up at Wipro, and I must say, it was an enlightening experience! 🚀

The topics covered - GenAI for developers & AWS Finops - were incredibly insightful, offering a deep dive into cutting-edge technologies and best practices in cloud computing. 💡

From exploring the potential of GenAI to streamline development processes to understanding the intricacies of AWS Finops for optimal financial management, every moment was packed with valuable learnings. 💻💰

Big shoutout to the AWS User Group Pune and Wipro for putting together such a fantastic event and to all the speakers for sharing their expertise! 👏

Can't wait to implement these learnings into my projects and continue exploring the endless possibilities in the AWS ecosystem. 🔍✨

#AWS #CloudComputing #GenAI #AWSFinops #TechCommunity #LearningJourney #Networking #WiproTechnologies

navigationContext.accessibilityText: Open article: Face Recognition Based Password Encryption and Decryption System by ieeexplore.ieee.org • 1 min read

title.text: Face Recognition Based Password Encryption and Decryption System

miniProfile.occupation: Python Developer and Partnership Lead at Microsoft Learning Student Club | Driving Innovation and Empowering Future Tech Leaders
Student at VIT, Pune | Tech Connoisseur | Captivating Tech Speaker | Lifelong Learner | 2025' Graduation
AWS Certified | Implementing DevOps

text.text:
📢 Excited to share some fantastic news with all of you! 🎉🎓

I am thrilled to announce that our research paper on "Face Recognition Based Password Encryption and Decryption System" has been published in the prestigious IEEE (Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers) journal! 📚🔬

I couldn't have asked for a better team to work on this project. I want to extend my heartfelt gratitude to my brilliant group members Swarup Vishwas, Vedant Sawant, and Akshay Shingote for their invaluable contributions throughout this journey. 🤝💡

This paper explores the cutting-edge realm of face recognition technology and its application in password encryption and decryption systems, enhancing security and usability for users worldwide. 🚀💻

I am truly honored to be a part of this groundbreaking research and to collaborate with such talented individuals. 🌟

If you're interested in reading our research, you can find the published paper on the IEEE Xplore platform. Your support and feedback mean the world to us! 🙏📖

https://lnkd.in/dpHr8Kvx

#ResearchPaper #IEEEPublication #FaceRecognition #Encryption #Decryption #Teamwork #Gratitude #AcademicAchievement

text.text:
🌟 Exciting News! 🌟

I'm thrilled to announce the launch of my new portfolio site, showcasing my projects and achievements! 🎉🚀

🔗 Check it out here: https://lnkd.in/dAnU2SrS

On my portfolio site, you'll find a curated collection of my most impactful projects and notable achievements. It's a comprehensive showcase of my skills, creativity, and expertise in the field. Here's what you can expect:

🚀 Projects: Dive into a range of projects that demonstrate my problem-solving abilities and technical prowess. Each project is meticulously detailed, highlighting the challenges overcome and the innovative solutions implemented. From web applications to mobile apps, you'll witness the diversity and depth of my work.

🏆 Achievements: Explore the recognition and milestones I've achieved throughout my journey. This section highlights awards, certifications, and noteworthy contributions that validate my skills and dedication. I'm proud to have been recognized for my hard work and the impact I've made in the industry.

I believe in pushing the boundaries of what's possible and continuously challenging myself. As such, my portfolio site will be regularly updated with new projects and achievements as I take on exciting challenges and embark on new endeavors.

I invite you to visit my portfolio site and immerse yourself in the projects and achievements that reflect my dedication and passion. Your support and feedback mean the world to me and will inspire me to reach even greater heights.

Let's connect and discuss how we can collaborate on future projects or opportunities. Feel free to reach out through the contact section on my portfolio site. I'm excited to explore new ventures and create meaningful impact together!

Thank you for being a part of my journey. Let's embark on this exciting adventure together!

#portfolio #projects #achievements #innovation #technology #webdevelopment  #creativity  #recognition
